# Glassee (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (glass sliver)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One nonmagical stone or metal object up to 1 cu. ft. per level

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** City of Splendors, Waterdeep (WotC), pg. 157

This spell gives the target object the transparency of glass.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Name changed from *Trobriand's glassee* to *glassee* for campaign continuity. 

*House Rule:* This spell is known as *Trobriandâ€™s glassee* in the Forgotten Realms campaign setting.

*House Rule:* Changed Duration from Permanent to Instantaneous.
